body_html:
thank you @byronyi, unfortunately tf-nightly is not yet (but soon will) suport GPUs. From the readme:

We are pleased to announce that TensorFlow now offers nightly pip packages under the tf-nightly project on pypi. Simply run pip install tf-nightly in a clean environment to install the nightly tensorflow build. We currently only support CPU packages on Linux, Mac, and Windows. GPU packages on all platforms will arrive soon!

We are pleased to announce that TensorFlow now offers nightly pip packages under the tf-nightly project on pypi. Simply run pip install tf-nightly in a clean environment to install the nightly tensorflow build. We currently only support CPU packages on Linux, Mac, and Windows. GPU packages on all platforms will arrive soon!
body:
thank you @byronyi, unfortunately tf-nightly is not yet (but soon will) suport GPUs. From the readme:

`We are pleased to announce that TensorFlow now offers nightly pip packages under the tf-nightly project on pypi. Simply run pip install tf-nightly in a clean environment to install the nightly tensorflow build. We currently only support CPU packages on Linux, Mac, and Windows. GPU packages on all platforms will arrive soon!`
